00024 #ifndef MEMORYMANAGER_H
00025 #define MEMORYMANAGER_H
00026 #include "DDD.h"
00027 #include "DED.h"
00028 #include "Hom.h"
00029 #include "SDD.h"
00030 #include "SDED.h"
00031 #include "SHom.h"
00032 #include "MLHom.h"
00033 
00034 
00035 #include "process.hpp"
00036 
00042 class MemoryManager{
00043 public:
00044   /* Mesure*/
00046   static unsigned int nbDDD(){return GDDD::statistics();};
00048   static unsigned int nbDED(){return DED::statistics();};
00050   static unsigned int nbHom(){return GHom::statistics();};
00052   static unsigned int nbSDD(){return GSDD::statistics();};
00054   static unsigned int nbSDED(){return SDED::statistics();};
00056   static unsigned int nbShom(){return GShom::statistics();};
00057   /* Garbage Collector */
00060   static void mark(const GDDD &g){g.mark();};
00063   static void mark(const GHom &h){h.mark();};
00064 
00066     static bool should_garbage() {
00067       // trigger at rougly 5 million objects =1 Gig RAM
00068       //return nbDED() + nbSDED() + nbShom() + nbSDD() > 3000000;
00069       size_t mem = process::getResidentMemory();
00070       if (mem == 0)
00071         return true;
00072       if (mem > last_mem) {
00073 /*      std::cerr << "GC triggered at mem=" << mem << std::endl; */
00074         last_mem = mem;
00075         return true;
00076       } else {
00077 /*      std::cerr << "GC not triggered mem=" << mem << std::endl; */
00078         return false;
00079       }
00080     }
00081 
00085   static void garbage(){
00086     MLHom::garbage();
00087     // FIXME : if you dont use SDD suppress the following
00088     SDED::garbage();
00089     GShom::garbage();
00090     GSDD::garbage();
00091     // END FIXME 
00092     DED::garbage();
00093     GHom::garbage();
00094     GDDD::garbage();
00095   };
00096 
00098   static void pstats(bool reinit=true){
00099     //cout << " Memory Usage " << MemUsage() << " %" << endl;
00100     
00101     // FIXME : if you dont use SDD suppress the following
00102     SDED::pstats(reinit);
00103     GShom::pstats(reinit);
00104     GSDD::pstats(reinit);    
00105     // END FIXME 
00106 
00107     DED::pstats(reinit);
00108     GHom::pstats(reinit);
00109     GDDD::pstats(reinit);    
00110   }
00111 
00112  private :
00113   // actually defined in DDD.cpp, bottom of file.
00114   static size_t last_mem;
00115 
00116 };
00117 #endif
